column4: is there a good place to go to look for *.deb files of 3rd party apps that are newer versions than what's in the repo -- but aren't availa directly from the software developer's website ?  ..maybe someone who tends to compile newer stuff and post it on their own PPA or something?
there is hardy-proposed as well as hardy-backports repositories from Ubuntu.
i checked getdeb. com ..but it only has newer version of major software packages like Gimp and Blender
